turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order some pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, and what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need three large pizzas. I would like them all to be Thai chicken.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, it doesn't look like bella luna has thai chicken on their menu. did you want another option?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Yeah. How about sausage, mushroom, and olives?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your order of 3 large pizzas, all with sausage, mushrooms, and olives comes out to $45.66.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want me to place the order for you now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I actually wanted to make sure that those can come with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me change that in the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: gluten free crust for all 3 pizzas has been added. do you need me to change anything else, or should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think everything looks good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, i've placed the order. it'll be ready in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think that sounds good. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, glad to help. take care.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
